fields.title: Cramer-Rao bound
fields.pointers: * The bound implies that  [maximum likelihood estimation is asymptotically efficient](asymptotics_of_maximum_likelihood) .
fields.summary: The Cramer-Rao bound gives the minimum possible variance of an unbiased estimator of the parameters of a probability distribution. It is used to prove the asymptotic efficiency of the maximum likelihood estimator.
